mapper.select: select m.id, moment_content, images, avatar, m.create_time from tb_moment m JOIN tb_user_info ui ON m.user_id = ui.id WHERE m.id = #{momentId} AND m.status = 1
select m.id, moment_content, images, m.is_top, m.status, m.create_time from tb_moment m JOIN tb_user_info ui ON m.user_id = ui.id WHERE m.id = #{momentId}
select m.id, moment_content, images, m.is_top, m.create_time from tb_moment m JOIN tb_user_info ui ON ui.id = m.user_id WHERE m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.is_top DESC, m.id DESC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}
